channel.title: Help - adding shops!
channel.description: can som1 help me add a shop.. i followed the tut exaclty how it is .. but when i trade the npc i lag out[br][size=1]Posted at: December 20, 2006, 10:35:04 PM[/size][hr]ne1 no?[br][size=1]Posted at: December 20, 2006, 10:48:11 PM[/size][hr]-.-

item.title: Help - adding shops!
item.dc:creator: @zammyking111 zammyking111
item.description:
@zammyking111 wrote:

Oh which npc gets the shop oh heres what you do go search in client.java for aubury magic shop and then it should find something like this

} else if (NPCID == 553) { //Aubury rune shop PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 2; //Aubury Magic Shop
then you would put your shop like this under neath the //aubury Magic shop

So lets say that i want the ghost shop keeper as my sales person ill do this

} else if (NPCID == 1699) { //Rare Shop PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 44; //ghost

See now the NPCID == is the npc that you would want too be your shopkeeper
hopefully that helped[br][size=1]Posted at: December 20, 2006, 11:14:27 PM[/size][hr]Ok now heres something else if you want the ghostshopkeeper as your sales men you would want too spawn him right… Duh you would want too spawn him how else are you going too use him lol. So heres what you do you go into autospawn then you go to the very bottom then you would do this

spawn = 1699 # # 0 # # # # 1 Rares keeper

Where i put the # is where you would put your cords of where you want him too spawn at!!

Read full topic

item.title: Help - adding shops!
item.dc:creator: @zammyking111 zammyking111
item.description:
@zammyking111 wrote:

Ok too add shops you go to i think shops .cfg and you type the number of the shop like this here ill give you an example of my rares shop XD

//-----ShopID—ShopName----------------------------------------Sell----Buy-----Item----Amount-- So on

shop = 44 Rare_items_store. 2 2 1038 600000 1040 600000 1042 600000 1044 600000 1046 600000 1048 600000 1050 600000 1053 600000 1055 600000 1057 600000 4079 600000 4566 600000 4565 600000 1419 600000

See XD…
And if this help you remember too rep me XD

Read full topic
